content.question: If <math alttext="g of x equals, 4 times the cosine of x, plus 2 times the sine of x, plus 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>g</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, then <math alttext="g prime of, open parenthesis, pi over 6, close parenthesis, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="negative 2, plus the square root of 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>+</mo><msqrt><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="2 minus the square root of 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><msqrt><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="2 plus the square root of 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><msqrt><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="2 plus 2 times the square root of 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>
